name: Cactus Simulator 2
description:
Cactus Simulator 2 is a game in which you can become a cactus.

This game will give you a meditative gameplay. You can stand and contemplate the beauty of the desert around you living your life as a cactus. You can also perform actions that cactus usually perform (stand in the same place).

New Features

  • 5 playable characters
  • 2 game mods: arcade and realistic
  • Dynamic change of day and night
  • Realistic graphics

Canonical Features

  • You're a cactus
  • You're in the desert
  • There are other cacti around you
  • And not only cacti
